table_info.name: TPJ_EMPLOYEE
fields: TpjEmployee.java 파일의 TpjEmployee 클래스는 TPJ_EMPLOYEE 테이블과 매핑되며, 기본키로 id(Long)를 사용합니다. 이 클래스는 deptCode(String, NOT NULL), empKey(String, NOT NULL, UNIQUE), regularYn(String, NOT NULL), empName(String, NOT NULL) 필드를 포함합니다.

table_info.name: TPJ_SALARY
fields: TpjSalary.java 파일의 TpjSalary 클래스는 TPJ_SALARY 테이블과 매핑되며, 기본키로 id(Long)를 사용합니다. 이 클래스는 salKey(String, NOT NULL, UNIQUE), payDate(LocalDate, NOT NULL), empKey(String), userId(UUID), amount(Long, NOT NULL) 필드를 포함합니다.

table_info.name: TPJ_ATTENDANCE
fields: TpjAttendance.java 파일의 TpjAttendance 클래스는 TPJ_ATTENDANCE 테이블과 매핑되며, 기본키로 id(Long)를 사용합니다. 이 클래스는 attKey(String, NOT NULL), status(String, NOT NULL), empKey(String), workDate(LocalDate) 필드를 포함합니다.

TPX_EMPLOYEE.44~47:
@Query("SELECT COUNT(e) FROM TpjEmployee e WHERE e.empKey = :empKey")
Long countByEmpKey(@Param("empKey") String empKey);
TPX_EMPLOYEE.64~67:
@Query("SELECT e FROM TpjEmployee e WHERE e.empKey = :empKey")
TpjEmployee findRegularYnByEmpKey(@Param("empKey") String empKey);

TPX_SALARY.55~59:
@Query("SELECT s FROM TpjSalary s WHERE s.empKey = :empKey AND s.payDate = :payDate")
Long countByEmpKeyAndPayDate(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("payDate") LocalDate payDate);
TPX_SALARY.102~106:
@Query("SELECT s FROM TpjSalary s WHERE s.empKey = :empKey AND s.payDate = :payDate")
TpjSalary findByEmpKeyAndPayDate(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("payDate") LocalDate payDate);
TPX_SALARY.178~181:
@Query("SELECT s FROM TpjSalary s WHERE s.empKey = :empKey AND s.payDate = :payDate")
TpjSalary findByEmpKeyAndPayDate(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("payDate") LocalDate payDate);

TPX_ATTENDANCE.80~85:
@Query("SELECT COUNT(a) FROM TpjAttendance a WHERE a.empKey = :empKey AND a.workDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND a.status = 'AB'")
Long countAbsentDays(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("startDate") LocalDate startDate, @Param("endDate") LocalDate endDate);

TpjEmployee:
@Query("SELECT COUNT(e) FROM TpjEmployee e WHERE e.empKey = :empKey")
Long countByEmpKey(@Param("empKey") String empKey);

@Query("SELECT e FROM TpjEmployee e WHERE e.empKey = :empKey")
TpjEmployee findRegularYnByEmpKey(@Param("empKey") String empKey);

TpjSalary:
@Query("SELECT s FROM TpjSalary s WHERE s.empKey = :empKey AND s.payDate = :payDate")
Long countByEmpKeyAndPayDate(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("payDate") LocalDate payDate);

@Query("SELECT s FROM TpjSalary s WHERE s.empKey = :empKey AND s.payDate = :payDate")
TpjSalary findByEmpKeyAndPayDate(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("payDate") LocalDate payDate);

TpjAttendance:
@Query("SELECT COUNT(a) FROM TpjAttendance a WHERE a.empKey = :empKey AND a.workDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND a.status = 'AB'")
Long countAbsentDays(@Param("empKey") String empKey, @Param("startDate") LocalDate startDate, @Param("endDate") LocalDate endDate);

TPX_UPDATE_SALARY.method_signature: void tpxUpdateSalary(Long baseAmount, String deptCode, String empKey, String empName, LocalDate payDate, String regularYn)

TPX_EMPLOYEE.method_signature: void insEmployee(String iDeptCode, String iEmpKey, String iEmpName, String iRegularYn)

TPX_SALARY.method_signature: void insSalary(String iEmpKey, LocalDate iPayDate, Long iBaseAmount)

TPX_ATTENDANCE.method_signature: void insAttendance(String iEmpKey, LocalDate iWorkDate, String iStatus)
Long getAbsentDays(String iEmpKey, LocalDate iStartDate, LocalDate iEndDate)
